ValidationRule.description: Date of First Treatment or Month of First Treatment1 must be entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Date_Treated_1__c ), ISBLANK( Treatment_1_MM_YYYY_If_No_Exact_Date__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Short_Term_Disability" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CL-032 Either Date Treated #1 or Treatment#1 MM/YYYY must be entered
